SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation.geoip2

Class GeoIP2PingERService

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation.BaseGeolocationService
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation.geoip2.GeoIP2PingERService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, IGeolocationService
public class GeoIP2PingERService extends BaseGeolocationService implements IGeolocationService, Closeable
Implements an offline IGeolocationService from the data downloaded from GeoLite2 and PingER.

Sample PingER data can be extracted with the following request: PingER request URL.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Constructor Details

    • GeoIP2PingERService

      public GeoIP2PingERService(InputStream geoIP2DB, InputStream pingErRTT, InputStream pingerMonitoringSites)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      geoIP2DB - - a stream to a valid mmdb data. Must not be null
      pingErRTT - - a stream to a TSV file extracted from the PingER service, containing data about RTTs between hosts distributed worldwide. Must not be null
      pingerMonitoringSites - - a stream to a CSV file extracted from the PingER service, containing the metadata of all hosts. Must not be null

    • GeoIP2PingERService

      public GeoIP2PingERService(File geoIP2DB, File pingErRTTFile, File pingerMonitoringSitesFile)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      geoIP2DB - - a valid file in the mmdb format.
      pingErRTTFile - - a TSV file extracted from the PingER service, containing data about RTTs between hosts distributed worldwide.
      pingerMonitoringSitesFile - - a CSV file extracted from the PingER service, containing the metadata of all hosts.

  • Method Details

    • getCoordinates

      public final double[] getCoordinates(String ip)
      Description copied from interface: IGeolocationService
      Returns estimation of the geographical the latitude and the longitude of the provided IP address.
      Specified by:
      getCoordinates in interface IGeolocationService
      Parameters:
      ip - - the ip to estimate the geolocation for. Must not be null. Must be a valid ip, in the sense of the previously described formats.
      Returns:
      an array with two elements in the form [Lattitude, Longtitude]. If any of them could not be estimated, the corresponding value in the resulting arrays is NaN - e.g. [NaN, NaN].

    • getMetaData

      public IPMetadata getMetaData(String ip)
      Description copied from interface: IGeolocationService
      Returns the extracted geographical information about the IP address.
      Specified by:
      getMetaData in interface IGeolocationService
      Parameters:
      ip - - the ip to estimate the geolocation for. Must not be null. Must be a valid ip, in the sense of the previously described formats.
      Returns:
      the extracted geographical information about the IP address. Any of properties can be null in case the data could not be extracted. Null can be returned if no metadata is extracted.

      public final double latency(String ip1, String ip2)
      Description copied from interface: IGeolocationService
      Returns an estimation of the latency between the two IPs, measured in ms.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

      ip2 - - must not be null. Must be a valid ip, in the sense of the previously described formats.
      Returns:
      an estimation of the latency between the two IPs, measured in ms.

    • latency

      public double latency(double[] reqCoord1, double[] reqCoord2)
      Description copied from interface: IGeolocationService
      Returns an estimation of the latency between the two IPs, measured in ms.
      Specified by:
      latency in interface IGeolocationService
      Parameters:
      reqCoord1 - - the latitude and longitude of the first point. Must be valid coordinates.
      reqCoord2 - - the latitude and longitude of the second point. Must be valid coordinates.
      Returns:
      an estimation of the latency between the two IPs, measured in ms.

    • weigthedAverage

      public double weigthedAverage(com.google.common.collect.MinMaxPriorityQueue<org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation.geoip2.GeoIP2PingERService.PingERLatencyEntry> heap)

    • updateHeap

      public void updateHeap(com.google.common.collect.MinMaxPriorityQueue<org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation.geoip2.GeoIP2PingERService.PingERLatencyEntry> heap, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation.geoip2.GeoIP2PingERService.PingERLatencyEntry qEntry)
      Adds the new entry to the heap, only if there is no other entry with less distance to the requested point and having a common node. If in the heap there is an element with a common node and greater distance, it is replaced with the new entry.

      The main idea of this method is to maintain "diversity", in terms of the used nodes in the heap.
      Parameters:
      heap - - the heap.
      qEntry - - the new entry.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException
